definitions.title: vb. Pa.
definitions.body: destroy, hurt (v. BH II, [[חבל]]);—Pf. 3 mpl. sf. [[חַבְּלוּנִי]] Da 6:23 (of lions); Imv. mpl. sf. [[חַבְּלוּהִי]] Da 4:20 (sf. of tree); Inf. [[לְחַבָּלָה]] Ezr 6:12 (acc. of temple).

definitions.title: Hithpa.
definitions.body: be destroyed: Impf. 3 fs. [[תִּתְחַבַּל]] Da 2:44, Da 6:27, Da 7:14 ([[בַָּל]]-; all of kingdom of God).
